body.name: Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin Free & Clear, 140 Loads Liquid Laundry Detergent, 140 Fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 31 mins
features: One 140 fl oz bottle of ARM & HAMMER Sensitive Skin Free & Clear Liquid Laundry Detergent, Free and Clear Detergent that cleans 140 medium loads when used as directed
Dermatologist-tested, hypoallergenic laundry detergent that's gentle on skin but tough on stains and odors, making it an ideal soap for sensitive skin

Dye-free, worry-free detergent with no perfumes or preservatives is certified 100% by SkinSAFE (1), (1) Certified by SkinSAFE to exclude 100% of their topmost considered skin allergens. In partnership with SkinSAFEproducts.com
With trusted ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, this HE detergent is formulated to deeply clean clothes while being gentle on skin
HE laundry detergent is concentrated with 2X powerful stain fighters in every load versus leading value detergent, making it an effective and efficient laundry detergent
body.description: ARM & HAMMER Sensitive Skin Free & Clear Liquid Laundry Detergent is gentle on skin, but powerful on dirt. This free and clear detergent is concentrated with 2X powerful stain fighters in every load versus the leading value detergent, making it powerful enough to handle your toughest loads in all wash temperatures, even cold water. Free from dyes, perfumes and preservatives, this hypoallergenic laundry detergent is dermatologist-tested and certified 100% by SkinSAFE (1). This low-sudsing laundry soap rinses clean and works in standard machines and High Efficiency (HE) models as an effective and efficient hypoallergenic detergent. Blended with trusted ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, this HE detergent is tough on odors, dirt and stains, leaving clothes clean and fresh. For standard bottles, fill cap to Bar A for medium-sized loads, or use half a capful for energy-saving cold water cycles compared to washing in warm water. Use a full cap of this dye free detergent for large or heavily soiled loads. For larger dispenser sizes, fill to top of Line C for medium loads. For large or heavily soiled loads, use half a capful. (1) Certified by SkinSAFE to exclude 100% of their topmost considered skin allergens. In partnership with SkinSAFEproducts.com

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin Plus Fresh Scent Liquid Laundry Detergent Arm & Hammer Clean & Simple In-Wash Light Scent Booster Lavender Escape Arm & Hammer Clean & Simple In-Wash Light Scent Booster Crisp Clean Arm & Hammer Sensitive Scent 5-in-1 Liquid Laundry Detergent Power Paks Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin Free & Clear Liquid Laundry Detergent Scent Hypoallergenic Fresh Scent Lavender Escape Crisp Clean Hypoallergenic Fresh Scent Unscented For Use In All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures Benefits Dye free laundry detergent specially formulated to eliminate tough dirt and odors all with a light, skin friendly scent that leaves clothes smelling great. In-wash scent boosters that are a sparkling mix of watery fruits and delicate blossoms to leave clothes smelling wonderfully fresh and clean, but not overpowering. Part herbal and part floral, Lavender Escape offers soothing comfort with a sweet, light herbal aroma delivered through tiny scent crystals for freshness that's not overpowering. These convenient pre-measured Power Paks combine ultra-concentrated laundry detergent with a hypoallergenic fresh scent that’s skin-friendly. This dermatologist tested and hypoallergenic washing detergent for sensitive skin is perfume, preservative, & dye free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle on Clothes, Tough on Stains!
reviews.reviewText: Arm & Hammer has done it again with their Sensitive Skin Free & Clear Liquid Laundry Detergent! As someone with sensitive skin, finding a detergent that delivers a powerful clean without irritating my skin has been a game-changer, and this product exceeded my expectations.The fragrance-free formula is a breath of fresh air – literally. It leaves my clothes smelling clean without any overpowering scents, making it ideal for those with sensitivity to fragrances. The dermatologist-tested and hypoallergenic design give me peace of mind, knowing that my clothes are not only clean but also gentle on my skin.The cleaning power of this detergent is impressive. From everyday wear to stubborn stains, it tackles everything with ease. I've noticed a significant improvement in the brightness and cleanliness of my laundry since making the switch to Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin. The 105 loads per bottle provide excellent value for the price, and a little goes a long way in terms of effectiveness.The convenient size and easy-to-use design make laundry day a breeze. The 105 fl oz size ensures that I have enough detergent to last for an extended period.In conclusion, if you're in search of a laundry detergent that is tough on stains but gentle on sensitive skin, Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin Free & Clear is the answer. It's become a staple in my laundry routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable, skin-friendly option. Five stars for a detergent that delivers on its promises!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this laundry detergent for a few months and I am very happy with it. It is gentle on my skin and does not cause any irritation or allergic reactions. It is also free from dyes, perfumes, and preservatives, which is great for people who are sensitive to these ingredients. It cleans my clothes very well and removes stains and odors effectively. It works well in both cold and warm water, and it is compatible with my HE washer. It also has a nice, fresh scent that is not overpowering. It is a concentrated detergent, so a little goes a long way. One bottle lasts me for 140 loads, which is a good value for money. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a hypoallergenic and effective laundry detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great soap; little or no fragrance
reviews.reviewText: My family switched over to low- or no-fragrance soaps several years back, trying a variety of brands and forms (liquid, powder, tablets). This product is one of the cheapest and largest containers that can currently be purchased on Amazon and the primary reason that I keep purchasing it. This continues to stay on my subscribe-and-save list due to cost, no issues with allergies, and my clothes come out clean and free of odors (body, fragrance, or otherwise).I would recommend this soap if you're intentionally trying to avoid fragrances - it just works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Leaked, but Great Product
reviews.reviewText: This leaked badly through the packaging. So I had to clean it and lost some of it. However, this product is great. The have very sensitive skin. All the other detergents I have tried give me bad rashes, but this detergent doesn’t bother me at all! So glad to have found something so clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really cleanse well
reviews.reviewText: and its VERY budget economical and best part NO sickening perfume, just clean smelling laundry detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle Powerhouse for Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: As someone with sensitive skin, finding a laundry detergent that effectively cleans while remaining gentle can be a challenge. Enter Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin Free & Clear Liquid Laundry Detergent, a game-changer in the realm of laundry care.Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin Free & Clear Liquid Laundry Detergent is a true find for individuals with sensitive skin or those who prefer a gentler approach to laundry care. Its efficient cleaning power, budget-friendly size, and commitment to being free of unnecessary additives make it a top-tier choice in the world of laundry detergents. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a reliable and skin-friendly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has no perfume, yay! The regular one is horrificly perfumed.
reviews.reviewText: I can't say how much I hate the amount of perfume they put in regular laundy detergent now, this brand included. I accidentally bought one of those and needed 3 washes to get the perfume out.This is the one I usually get, unscented. Have used it for years now, it's good stuff. I am glad there is an option for people like me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very heavy and tends to leak.
reviews.reviewText: The soap bottles are very heavy. The caps are not on tightly from the factory. Order this separately from other stuff. Don't order more stuff until it has shipped. The Amazon warehouse people are not smart and probably in too big of a hurry to make sure the caps are tight. Unless you are ok with your other stuff coming covered in laundry soap and getting thrown onto a UPS truck with a couple of big heavy soap bottles crushing it, don't do it. Fortunately the mirror I ordered was packaged well enough that it did not break. Was fun washing the soap off though. Just a tip. You gotta think of what is being shipped with your stuff because they won't. I guess if you don't mind the hassle of sending broken stuff back ignore this.
